import{w3cwebsocket as W3CWebSocket}from"websocket";var socket=new W3CWebSocket((window.location.protocol==="https:"?"wss://":"ws://")+window.location.host+"/ws");var x=false;socket.onopen=function(){console.log('WebSocket Client Connected');x=true;};function waitForCalback(){if(x==false){setTimeout(waitForCalback,10);}}// socket.send('Hello')
export default socket;
